name: Destinations EFC LLC
about: Destinations EFC LLC is a premier flight school dedicated to producing professional pilots for the global aviation industry. Located in a state-of-the-art facility, we offer a comprehensive flight training program accredited under FAA Part 141, ensuring the highest standards of training. Our curriculum is designed to prepare students for careers with major airlines, with a focus on safety, efficiency, and excellence. Our experienced instructors and modern fleet provide an ideal learning environment. We pride ourselves on our high first-time pass rates and guaranteed programs for domestic and international students. At Destinations EFC LLC, we are committed to developing skilled and confident pilots ready to take on the demands of the aviation world. Join us to embark on a successful flying career.
services:
["Ground School
Intro Flight
Airline Transport Pilot ATP
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
